title: Rife Therapy Vaccine Detox
author: The Alchemist's Botanica
description: **In the special instructions section, please add your full name, date of birth and which of the vaccine you have had to take** Rife Therapy Vax Detox Extensive Rife Therapy COVID-19 Vaccine Detox Sweep AstraZeneca Pfizer Moderna nRNA Spike Protein Sweep Graphene Oxide Removal Remote Rife Therapy applies healing frequencies at any distance using the recipient's witness (name, date of birth, photo) to treat and or heal. It uses the principles of quantum physics to transmit through non-local space. Modern physicists named it "quantum entanglement." Simply put, it means that if any part of a single system is removed from that system to a different location, any action performed on the part will also be instantaneously performed on the parent system and vice versa. Remote treatments can fit perfectly into your busy lifestyle. When you're doing treatments with Remote Rife Therapy, you don't have to be in the same room or in the same country. Only your witness is needed in the treatments. ***Please note that this is not a replacement for emergency care*** Disclaimer** This is energy therapy and it works with frequencies, I cannot guarantee the outcome of treatment, individual results may vary based on a patient's medical history and other factors due to their current state of health.
